tit.e: The high purity of lactic acid for making sake
The lactic acid for making sake
tit.cmt: high purityの補足部分は以下の文で説明されるので、除きました。
tit.e: The lactic acid for making sake

sen.j: 醸造用乳酸（じょうぞうようにゅうさん）とは、日本酒の醸造過程における日本酒酒母造りで必要とされる純度の高い乳酸のことである。
sen.e: The high purity of lactic acid for making sake is the high-purity lactic acid required in making yeast mash in the process of brewing Japanese sake (rice wine).
The lactic acid for making sake is the high-purity lactic acid required in making yeast mash in the process of brewing Japanese sake (rice wine).
sen.cmt: 最初のhigh purityを除きました。
sen.e: The lactic acid for making sake is the high-purity lactic acid required in making yeast mash in the process of brewing Japanese sake (rice wine).
Usually it has the purity of 90 to 92 percent.
It usually has the purity of 90 to 92 percent.
It usually has the purity of 90 to 92 percent.

sen.j: 醸造規格に適合していなければならない。
sen.e: It must comply with the brewing standard.
It must conform to the brewing standard.
It must conform to the brewing standard.

sen.j: 酵母を、雑菌や野生酵母から守る役割をする。
sen.e: It is to protect from bacteria and wild yeasts.
It is to protect yeast from bacteria and wild yeasts.
sen.cmt: 訳抜け。「酵母を」を補足しました。
sen.e: It is to protect yeast from bacteria and wild yeasts.
